thread.section_title: Kiddies Kingdom Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiddies Kingdom | www.kiddies-kingdom.com
thread.title: Mrs Sharron Brookes
thread.title_full: Kiddies Kingdom reviewed by Mrs Sharron Brookes

author: Mrs Sharron Brookes
title: Mrs Sharron Brookes
text:
My purchase arrived damaged , I was advised that a new one would be with me the following day , nothing arrived .
I had to make several calls but the problem wasn't resolved as no one seemed to know what they were doing , I was given the original consignment no & told to contact the delivery company which I feel wasn't my place this should have been done for me .
Eventually I did have a new one delivered but days later which I feel was quite poor as the mistakes made could have been avoided if it had been properly addressed in the beginning .
It's a great item despite all .
